combatSkills.name: Shining Trail
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Ultra Light P.Attack w/temp Str. Boost & Ultra Penetration Rate and Dmg. received (Attack Type: All Targets)+40%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Luminescence
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Fast Hi Light P.Attack w/Ultra Unguard Rate & Guard Rate-30% and Dmg. received (Attack Type: All Targets)+30%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Crystal Slasher
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Super Light P.Attack w/Ultra Uncounter Rate & removes P.Resist Buff and Dmg. Reduction (Attack Type: All Targets) exc. Assist Skills

combatSkills.name: Light Brandish
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Hi Light P.Attack Dmg.+35% per each [Self] Str. Buff Skill & Hi Penetration Rate

passiveSkills.name: Will of Light
passiveSkills.description: When countering and attacking, regular P.Attack a Foe with Light Element.
